name: Windsurfers Paradise
overview: Windsurfers Paradise is a video game available, on PSone, of sport genre, developed by Theyer Gfx and published by Midas Interactive Entertainment. Great if you're a windsurfer stuck at home with the need to do some windsurfing!! Game is fairly basic but is all wave competitions and allows you to free-ride, similar layout idea to some of the surfing games out there(i.e. Tran World Surfing)You can chose boards/sailors(no famous ones!!)and different sailing locations. There are multiplayer options too.
